titleStmt.title: A reply made by Mr. Thomas Pury, alderman of Glovcester, unto two gentlemen of the long robe and two knights of the Hovse of Commons touching episcopacy and den̂es [sic] and chapters : at a committee of the whole Hovse.
titleStmt.author: Pury, Thomas, ca. 1590-1666.
